responses: Hello! How can I assist you with banking today?

patterns: I want to open a bank account
responses: You can open an account online through our website/app or visit your nearest branch with your KYC documents.

patterns: what kinds of bank accounts are there?
responses: We offer savings, current, salary, NRI, and business accounts. Which one are you interested in?
You can check your account status in the mobile app or online banking portal. You can also visit a branch.

patterns: I want to close my account
how do I close my bank account?
responses: To close your account, please visit the nearest branch with your ID proof and cheque book.
You can use mobile banking to update some details or visit a branch for major changes like name or address.
You can check your balance via our mobile app, net banking, ATM, or by dialing *99#.
Your recent transaction history is available in your banking app and net banking portal.

patterns: I need to make a payment
responses: To transfer funds, you can use UPI, IMPS, NEFT/RTGS via net banking, or visit a branch.
IMPS (Immediate Payment Service) enables instant 24x7 fund transfers.
NEFT (National Electronic Funds Transfer) transfers are processed in hourly batches.
RTGS (Real-Time Gross Settlement) is used for high-value (usually above 2 Lakh) real-time transfers.
UPI allows instant transfers via mobile apps like GPay, PhonePe, Paytm. Please check your app for issues.

patterns: how to send money to usa
responses: International transfers (remittances) can be done via SWIFT. Please visit your branch for details and FEMA guidelines.

patterns: my card is not working online
responses: Please check if your card is active and online/contactless usage is enabled in the app. Or contact support.

patterns: i want a new debit card
responses: You can request a new debit card from your mobile app, net banking, or at any branch.
You can apply for a credit card online or speak to our banking representative about your eligibility.

patterns: what is my credit card limit
responses: Credit limit increase depends on your eligibility and usage history. You can apply in the card settings section of your app.

patterns: I can't find my atm card
responses: I have temporarily blocked your card. Please contact support immediately or use the app to permanently block it and request a replacement.

patterns: I forgot my credit card pin
responses: You can reset your PIN instantly via our mobile app (using 'Green PIN' generation) or at any of our ATMs.
We offer home, personal, business, vehicle, and educational loans. Which one are you interested in?
You can apply for most loans directly through our mobile app or website. You can also visit a branch.Share some of your information so we can contact you directly

patterns: what is the interest on home loan
responses: Interest rates vary by loan type, amount, and your credit score. Please check our website for the latest rates.
You can track your loan application status in the 'Loans' section of our mobile app or contact support.
You can pay EMIs via auto-debit (e-NACH), UPI, net banking, or by depositing at a branch.

patterns: i want to buy a house
responses: Home loans are available with competitive rates for purchase, construction, or renovation. Would you like to know more?

patterns: i want to buy a car
responses: Car loans are available for new and used vehicles, covering up to 90% of the vehicle's value.
Personal loans are available with minimal documentation for various needs like weddings, travel, or medical emergencies.
Business loans are available for MSMEs, startups, and established companies. Please contact our business banking team.
You can complete your KYC (Know Your Customer) via video KYC on our app or by visiting a branch with your ID and address proof.
Please submit your PAN copy at a branch or upload it through the net banking portal to update/link it.
Aadhaar linking and updates can be done in the app using OTP, or by visiting a branch.
Please check the 'Interest Rates' section on our website or app for the latest rates on all deposits.
You can open a Fixed Deposit instantly via our mobile banking app or at any branch. We also offer tax-saving FDs.
Recurring deposits (RDs) are available from 6 months to 10 years. You can start one from the app.
You can withdraw your FD after maturity via online banking or by visiting a branch. Premature withdrawal is also possible with a penalty.
Please use our mobile app's 'ATM Locator' feature to find the nearest ATM.
You can find the nearest branch, along with its timings and IFSC code, using the 'Branch Locator' tool on our website or app.
You can register for net banking on our website using your debit card details, or request assistance at a branch.
You can download our official app from the App Store or Play Store. For support, try reinstalling or call customer care.
You can reset your password from the login page using the 'Forgot Password' link.
Please ensure you are using the correct credentials. If the problem persists, try resetting your password.
WARNING: Do not share your CVV, PIN, or OTP with anyone. The bank never asks for this. Please report fraud immediately.
Please contact our 24x7 helpline or visit your branch immediately to report the fraud.

patterns: i need a new cheque book
responses: You can order a new cheque book via our mobile app, net banking, or by submitting a request at your branch.
You can track the status of your issued or deposited cheques in the banking app.

patterns: i want to stop a cheque
responses: You can place a 'stop payment' request for a cheque via the mobile app or net banking. Charges may apply.
You can download your interest certificate and Form 16A (TDS certificate) from the 'Services' section of online banking.
You can download or email your account statements for any period from the mobile app or net banking portal.
The minimum balance requirement (AMB) varies by account type. Please check your account details online.
You can check current forex rates in our app or website. We also offer multi-currency forex cards for travel.
We provide a range of life, health, and general (car, travel) insurance products. Would you like to connect with an expert?
Locker facilities are available at select branches. Please contact your branch to check for availability.
We are sorry for the inconvenience. You can submit your complaint online via our grievance portal or visit a branch.
We value your feedback! Please share your feedback in the app or on the website's feedback form.
You can call our 24x7 helpline at 1800-XXX-XXXX or visit our website's 'Contact Us' page for a detailed contact matrix.
Live currency exchange rates are available in the 'Forex' section of our app and website.

patterns: how much can i withdraw from atm
responses: The daily ATM cash withdrawal limit depends on your debit card type. You can check your limit in the 'Cards' section of the app.
To freeze or unfreeze your account, please visit your home branch or call our customer helpline immediately.
An Overdraft (OD) facility is available for eligible current and salary accounts. Please apply at your branch.
You can pay all your bills (electricity, water, gas, mobile) through the 'Bill Pay' section of our mobile banking portal.
You can deposit cash at your branch or at any of our 24x7 Cash Deposit Machines (CDMs).

patterns: how much emi will i pay
responses: You can use the EMI calculator on our website to estimate your monthly payments.
Mortgage loans (Loan Against Property) are available. Please contact your nearest branch for details.
Our branches are generally open Mon-Sat, 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM (closed on 2nd/4th Saturdays and Sundays). Timings may vary by branch.
Our CSR reports and activities are available on our website under the 'About Us' section.
You can reset your access using the 'Forgot Password' link and OTP, or you may need to visit a branch.
You can add or change your account nominee by filling a form at your branch or through net banking.
Please enable international usage for your card in the 'Card Settings' section of the mobile app before you travel.
Thank you for informing us. You can set a travel notice in the mobile app to ensure seamless card usage abroad.
For security, you must visit your nearest branch with your ID proof to change your registered mobile number.
You can update your email ID instantly via the 'Profile' section of your online banking settings.
If your PIN is blocked from 3 wrong attempts, it will auto-unblock after 24 hours. You can also reset it at an ATM.
Our complete schedule of charges (SOC) is available on our website. You can also check your statement for details.
You can set up a 'Standing Instruction' or 'Auto-Debit' (e-NACH) using the 'Bill Pay' section of mobile banking.

patterns: when will i get my atm card
responses: You can track your card dispatch and delivery status from our card dispatch portal. The link is sent via SMS.
Please check your mobile network and signal. Also, ensure your number is not on DND (Do Not Disturb). Try restarting your phone.

patterns: i need to meet the manager
responses: You can visit the branch during working hours and request an appointment with the Branch Manager.
We offer various investment options like Mutual Funds (SIPs), stocks, and bonds. Please speak to our relationship manager.
PPF accounts are available. You can open one via your branch or net banking.
We offer specialized NRE/NRO accounts for NRIs. Please check our website's NRI section for details.
A secure virtual debit card is available in your mobile app, which you can use for online payments.
Your Customer ID is available on your passbook, cheque book, and in the 'Profile' section of the mobile app.
You can download your personal UPI QR code from any UPI app. For a merchant QR, please use our merchant banking app.
You can check and redeem your reward points by logging into your card portal or through net banking.

patterns: i need more money on my loan
responses: A loan top-up is available for eligible existing loan customers. Please check your pre-approved offers in the app.

patterns: i want to change my emi date
responses: A change in EMI date is possible for some loans, subject to approval. Please submit a request at your branch.
Yes, you can pre-close your loan. Prepayment charges may apply. Please submit a pre-closure form at your branch.
GST details for bank charges are available in your statement. Our bank's GST number is available in the 'About Us' section.

patterns: does the bank have a wallet?
responses: Yes, you can use our secure bank e-wallet for quick payments and offers. It's integrated into our mobile app.
We offer special savings accounts for senior citizens with benefits like higher FD rates and priority service.
Yes, we have student-friendly bank accounts with zero balance requirements and other benefits.
Please visit our 'Contact Us' page to submit a support form, and our team will get back to you.

patterns: i want to talk to a person
responses: Connecting you to a human representative... Please hold.
Understood. Transferring you to a live agent now.
